com.att.research.xacml.util

Class XACMLPolicyAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.util.XACMLPolicyScanner.SimpleCallback
      • com.att.research.xacml.util.XACMLPolicyAggregator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XACMLPolicyScanner.Callback

    public class XACMLPolicyAggregator
extends XACMLPolicyScanner.SimpleCallback
    This class extends the SimpleCallback class and aggregates specific data items in a policy. It will map all the Attribute Designator and Attribute Selector elements found within the policy. If there are associated Attribute Values for the designator/selector elements, then those values are also aggregated. The attribute data is stored in a hierarchical map: Map>> It also aggregates obligations and advice identifiers into a map. Each key has a list of Obligation or Advice objects. Map> It also aggregates variable definitions into a map. Each entry is the Policy mapping to its list of Variable Definitions. Useful for policy editing. Map> The map is useful for building policy simulation tools, policy editing, importing data into the dictionaries, as well as for testing and exercising a policy.
    Author:
    pameladragosh
